thread.title: Garry Traynor

author: Garry Traynor
title: Garry Traynor
text:
Excellent Quality Alloy Wheels and Tyres at Excellent Prices. Their Prices for Brand New Alloy Wheels can cost you less than the cost of Second Hand or Refurbished.
Speedy Delivery within 1-2 days of ordering.
Very Helpful Staff on hand to take your call and assist you with your Purchase.
I was only able to afford 2 Wheel/Tyre Packaged this month, but I am certainly going nowhere else to buy the next 2 sets next month.
I will certainly be recommending them to any friends looking for new Alloy Wheels!
